channel.title: Career on davidstamen.com
channel.description: Recent content in Career on davidstamen.com

item.title: To Infinity and Beyond!
item.description: Life can always surprise you. For the past few years I have been chasing the dream like most to work for the “mothership” and recently the calling came. This month I will be joining the CPBU at VMware as a Technical Marketing Engineer focusing on vSphere Upgrades. I will be working alongside Adam Eckerle, Emad Younis and Nigel Hickey. Nigel Hickey has it perfect when he titled his announcement “Oh the places you’ll go”.
